title: Poga훾ar Cools His Jets While Merlier Fires Warning Shot to Sprinters with Second Win at UAE Tour
content:
In a first since his wild season debut this week, Poga훾ar did nothing Saturday except follow the wheels: 'Today I kept my calm.'
